metadata.Title: CVE-2023-37453 on Ubuntu 22.04 ESM (jammy) - medium
metadata.Description:
An issue was discovered in the USB subsystem in the Linux kernel through6.4.2. There is an out-of-bounds and crash in read_descriptors indrivers/usb/core/sysfs.c.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2023-37453` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

linux-image-unsigned-6.1.0-1023-oem - 6.1.0-1023.23
No subscription required

linux-image-unsigned-6.2.0-1017-aws - 6.2.0-1017.17~22.04.1
No subscription required

linux-image-unsigned-6.2.0-1018-azure - 6.2.0-1018.18~22.04.1
No subscription required

linux-image-unsigned-6.2.0-1018-azure-fde - 6.2.0-1018.18~22.04.1.1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: linux package in jammy is affected and needs fixing.
